title: I Hope I Shall Arrive Soon
description: This volume brings together ten previously uncollected stories and a major unpublished essay, which span nearly thirty years of the career of the noted science fiction writer.Contents:- Introduction: How to Build a Universe That Doesn't Fall Apart Two Days Later by  Philip K. Dick- The Short Happy Life of the Brown Oxford (1954)- Explorers We (1959)- Holy Quarrel (1966)- What'll We Do with Ragland Park? (1963)- Strange Memories of Death (1984)- The Alien Mind (1981)- The Exit Door Leads In (1979)- Chains of Air, Web of Aether (1980)- Rautavaara's Case (1980)- I Hope I Shall Arrive Soon (1980, variant of Frozen Journey)
author: Philip K. Dick
